name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior iOS Developer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Swift**, **SwiftUI**, **UIKit**, and **Combine** for developing scalable and responsive iOS applications. Expertise in utilizing **Core Data** for local data management, implementing **URLSession** for network communication, and integrating **REST APIs** and **WebSockets** for real-time features. Strong knowledge in **biometric authentication**, **APNs**, and **Firebase Cloud Messaging** to enhance user experience and security. Experienced in applying **MVVM** and **VIPER** design patterns while adhering to **Clean Architecture** principles, ensuring maintainable and testable code. Skilled in employing **XCTest** for robust unit testing to maintain high code quality.

Additionally, I have hands-on experience in modern web technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. I bring practical knowledge in driving cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, and have led enterprise platforms incorporating AI/ML for analytics and automation. My strong background in **microservices architecture** and **CI/CD** automation ensures that I deliver secure solutions compliant with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, creating systems that are impactful and technically sound.
